empty.description: No arcane selected here. Click to choose one.

dyadB.name: Step and Shadow Dyad
dyadB.description: Make two moves, no capturing (Pawn, Herring).

dyadC.name: Warrior's Oath Dyad
dyadC.description: Make two moves, no capturing (Bishop, Knight, Zebra, Unicorn, Rook).

dyadD.name: Veil and Vow Dyad
dyadD.description: Make two moves, no capturing (Spectre, Wraith).

dyadE.name: Judgement Dyad
dyadE.description: Make two moves, no capturing (Mystic, Templar, Queen).

dyadF.name: Fatebound Dyad
dyadF.description: Make two moves, no capturing (Valkyrie, King).

toknHER.name: Hermit
toknHER.description: Casts an aura of Royalty Mystic square conditions. Can't capture. Overrides Herring. Stacks with Hemlock.

toknHEM.name: Hemlock
toknHEM.description: Invisible to your opponent. 1 up 1 over and 1 up 3 over move pattern similar to Knight, moves across the other side of the board. Overrides Herring. Stacks with Hermit.

sumnH.name: Summon Herring
sumnH.description: Summon a Herring to an empty square. A Herring must be captured if the move is legal.

auraF.name: Hiding Lantern
auraF.description: Hermit casts Fog of War Aura.

sumnP.name: Summon Pawn
sumnP.description: Summon a Pawn to an empty square.

sumnN.name: Summon Knight
sumnN.description: Summon a Knight to an empty square.

sumnZ.name: Summon Zebra
sumnZ.description: Summon a Zebra to an empty square.

sumnU.name: Summon Unicorn
sumnU.description: Summon a Unicorn to an empty square.

sumnB.name: Summon Bishop
sumnB.description: Summon a Bishop to an empty square.

sumnR.name: Summon Rook
sumnR.description: Summon a Rook to an empty square.

sumnS.name: Summon Spectre
sumnS.description: Summon a Spectre to an empty square.

sumnW.name: Summon Wraith
sumnW.description: Summon a Wraith to an empty square.

sumnQ.name: Summon Queen
sumnQ.description: Summon a Queen to an empty square.

sumnT.name: Summon Templar
sumnT.description: Summon a Templar to an empty square.

sumnM.name: Summon Mystic
sumnM.description: Summon a Mystic to an empty square.

sumnV.name: Summon Valkyrie
sumnV.description: Summon a Valkyrie to an empty square.

sumnX.name: Summon Exile
sumnX.description: Summon an Exile to an empty square. An Exile is a neutral piece that cannot be moved or captured.

sumnRQ.name: Royalty Queen
sumnRQ.description: Summon a Queen Royalty condition to a square for 4 turns. Pieces on this square move like a Queen.

sumnRT.name: Royalty Templar
sumnRT.description: Summon a Templar Royalty condition to a square for 4 turns. Pieces on this square move like a Templar.

sumnRM.name: Royalty Mystic
sumnRM.description: Summon a Mystic Royalty condition to a square for 4 turns. Pieces on this square move like a Mystic.

sumnRV.name: Royalty Valkyrie
sumnRV.description: Summon a Valkyrie Royalty condition to a square for 4 turns. Pieces on this square move like a Valkyrie.

sumnRE.name: Entanglement
sumnRE.description: Summon an Entanglement condition to a square for 4 turns. Pieces on this square cannot move.

sumnRN.name: Disarm
sumnRN.description: Summon a square condition where the piece on the target square may not make any capture moves.

sumnRY.name: Hexweaver's Staff
sumnRY.description: Select a square, all squares along that file have entanglement for 4 turns.

sumnRZ.name: Hexweaver's Tornado
sumnRZ.description: Select a square, all squares along that rank have entanglement for 4 turns.

sumnRA.name: Hexweaver's Tomb
sumnRA.description: Place a 3x3 block, all squares in that block have entanglement for 4 turns.

sumnRF.name: Hexweaver's Curtain
sumnRF.description: Summon a 3x3 aura with fog of war.

sumnRG.name: Hexweaver's Fallout
sumnRG.description: Summon a 5x5 aura with fog of war.

sumnRH.name: Hexweaver's Web
sumnRH.description: Summon a 5x5 grid of alternating entanglement and fog of war.

sumnRI.name: Hexweaver's Scepter
sumnRI.description: Summon a 3x3 grid containing all the royal square conditions.

shftP.name: Champion
shftP.description: Move a Pawn one square backwards, left, or right, no capturing.

shftN.name: Pegasus
shftN.description: Move a Knight, Zebra, or Unicorn one square in any orthogonal or diagonal direction, no capturing.

shftB.name: Marksmen
shftB.description: Move a Bishop one square in any orthogonal direction, no capturing.

shftR.name: Citadel
shftR.description: Move a Rook one square in any diagonal direction, no capturing.

shftG.name: Liquid
shftG.description: Spectre and Wraith gain the other's moveset, no capturing.

shftK.name: Shogun
shftK.description: Your King can move and capture in the 5x5 ring... and check an opposing King that does not have Shogun.

shftI.name: Eclipse
shftI.description: A piece may hop over an adjacent piece to the next square in the same direction, no capturing. If that same piece is on the A or H file, it may hop to the opposite side of the board.

swapDEP.name: Ally Translocate
swapDEP.description: Swap the positions of a friendly minor or major piece (no P, H, V, K).

swapADJ.name: Proximity Translocate
swapADJ.description: Swap the positions of any orthogonally adjacent pieces, no Pawn promotions or swaping just your opponent's pieces. Use at your own risk.

modsREA.name: Iron Reach
modsREA.description: Friendly Valkyries gain the Queen moveset, friendly Wraiths gain the Bishop moveset.

modsEXT.name: Omni Gaze
modsEXT.description: You may summon pieces and square conditionsamongst the whole board.

modsFUG.name: Sovereign Fugitive
modsFUG.description: Castle while in or through check.

modsTRO.name: Trojan Gambit
modsTRO.description: If your opponent can legally capture you via en passant, they must.

modsINH.name: Inheritance
modsINH.description: Friendly Pawns promote one rank early.

modsPHA.name: Phantom Mist
modsPHA.description: Your pieces become invisible to your opponent for 3 turns.

modsIMP.name: Tactical Vision
modsIMP.description: The engine gives you a hint for the best move, from sqaure only.

modsORA.name: Oracle Whisper
modsORA.description: The engine gives you a hint for the best move, from and to square.

modsTEM.name: Temporal Pincer
modsTEM.description: Get engine's best calculate line of moves after 3 seconds of thinking time.

modsGLI.name: Neural Scrambler
modsGLI.description: The next engine move is randomized.

modsAET.name: Aetherstep
modsAET.description: Friendly Pawns may can step through a piece on their first turn.

modsSUR.name: Aether Surge
modsSUR.description: Friendly Pawns can capture on the first-turn, 2-square move.

modsGLU.name: Gluttony
modsGLU.description: You may capture pieces during dyad moves.

modsBAN.name: The Banshee
modsBAN.description: Spectre move pattern is extended to the 7x7 square, non-capture moves only. Cannot wield 5D Sword.

modsDIM.name: 5th Dimension Sword
modsDIM.description: Capture pieces on shift moves. Hermits and Hemlocks may capture.

modsDIV.name: Divine Reckoning
modsDIV.description: Friendly Pawn automatically promote to a Valkyrie with Iron Reach.

modsHEX.name: Hexlash
modsHEX.description: When a Bishop, Knight, Zebra, Unicorn, Rook, Wraith, or Spectre is captured, the capturing piece becomes frozen.

modsGLA.name: Glare
modsGLA.description: Any opponent piece attacked by a friendly Rook has Disarmament.

modsREI.name: Reincarnate
modsREI.description: Any friendly pieces captured with Consume come back to you as a summon arcane.

modsFLA.name: Flank Inversion
modsFLA.description: Swap all the pieces on the A file with the H file. Kings cannot be swapped.

modsEVO.name: Berserking Evolution
modsEVO.description: Click to activate. All moves (including captures) evolve pieces while active: P→N→R, ZUB→R→W, WSH→Q→V, MT→V.

modsMAG.name: Magnet
modsMAG.description: Pick a square. Pieces exactly 2-3 squares away in orthogonal directions are moved one square toward that square if not blocked.

modsRED.name: Reduction
modsRED.description: Reduce the scope of enemy slider patterns (any piece that moves like Rook / Bishop) from 7 to 3 for 4 turns.

modsTRA.name: Trample
modsTRA.description: Use your turn to eliminate an opponent's piece that is attacked by a friendly Equus (Knight, Zebra, Unicorn). Equus stays in place.

modsBOU.name: Reflect Attack
modsBOU.description: Friendly Bishops (not all Bishop move patterns) reflect off of the wall once.

moriDYA.name: Letum Gemini
moriDYA.description: On the first death of each of your piece types (PNZUBRSW), you gain a dyad all

moriROY.name: Letum Vultus
moriROY.description: On your QTMV death you gain a royalty vanguard

moriNOR.name: Letum Anima
moriNOR.description: On the first death of each of your piece types (PNZUBRSW), you get a summon of that piece

moriMAN.name: Letum Arcana Charge
moriMAN.description: On any of your piece death, gain 2 arcana charge tempo.

moraDYA.name: Nex Gemini
moraDYA.description: On the first death of each of your opponent's piece types (PNZUBRSW), you gain a dyad all

moraROY.name: Nex Vultus
moraROY.description: On opponent's QTMV death you gain a royalty vanguard

moraNOR.name: Nex Anima
moraNOR.description: On the first death of each of your opponent's piece types (PNZUBRSW), you get a summon of that piece

moraMAN.name: Nex Arcana Charge
moraMAN.description: On any of your opponent's piece death, gain 2 arcana charge tempo.

gainPIN.name: Pin Gain
gainPIN.description: Achieve a pin, gain a dyad.

gainFOR.name: Fork Gain
gainFOR.description: Achieve a fork, gain a dyad.

gainOUT.name: Outpost Gain
gainOUT.description: Achieve an outpost with a minor piece or Rook, gain a dyad.

gainDYA.name: Dyad Reckoning
gainDYA.description: When a friendly Bishop, Knight, Zebra, or Unicorn reaches the opposite side of the board, you gain a Dyad.

gainVAL.name: Titan's Reckoning
gainVAL.description: When a friendly Bishop, Knight, Zebra, or Unicorn reaches the opposite side of the board, you gain a Royalty Valkyrie Summon.

gainPAW.name: Soldier's Reckoning
gainPAW.description: When a friendly Bishop, Knight, Zebra, or Unicorn reaches the opposite side of the board, you gain a Pawn Summon.

gainCOM.name: Combo Berserker
gainCOM.description: Every 4 checks you give your opponent's King, you gain a Dyad.

doplA.name: Doppleganger I
doplA.description: At the start of the game, this spell is replaced by a random low-impact spell. The result is always playable and never game-warping.

doplB.name: Doppleganger II
doplB.description: At the start of the game, this spell is replaced by a random mid-impact spell. The result may meaningfully affect the position.

doplC.name: Doppleganger III
doplC.description: At the start of the game, this spell is replaced by a random high-impact spell. The result is volatile but does not redefine your archetype.
